name: Young Sapphire Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: A Large dragon with shimmering sapphire scales, capable of flight and psionic powers, it moves with grace and confidence.
memorable: Possesses unique psionic abilities that allow it to observe creatures over vast distances, making it an exceptional scout.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate using its psionic powers and to gather information about other beings.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dragons or creatures of psionic nature, often in conflict over territory or secrets.
environment: Typically found in mountainous or secluded areas where it can have vast spaces to utilize its flying speed and psionic observation.
strengths: High Armor Class, substantial hit points, psychic damage immunity, and powerful mental abilities make it a dangerous opponent.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to attacks that specifically target its psionic capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with a powerful bite and slashing claws, supplemented by its Discognitive Breath that deals substantial psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Discognitive Breath, unleashing a cone of psychic energy that can severely damage multiple foes.
senses: Has keen senses with a passive perception score of 20, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Exeptionally skilled in arcana, history, and perception, making it a clever and insightful adversary.
additional_information: Immunity to psychic damage and being fatigued.
Can communicate through telepathy over a distance of 120 feet.
Innate spellcasting ability allows for versatile magical capabilities.
Awareness of psionic activities within 100 miles through Far Thoughts.
Blind and deaf to its physical surroundings while using its psionic observation.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability with access to comprehend languages and detect thoughts three times per day.
test_queries: dragon that can fly and observe from afar
sapphire dragon with devastating psychic breath
intelligent dragon that excels in psionic combat
large dragon immune to psychic damage
